original: Bratt, Karl Harry Malcolm, generalkonsul, Göteborg, f. 21/1/90 i Sthlm av trafikchef Hugo B. o. Elvira Blom-qvist. — Styrmansex. i Gbg 09, sjö-kapt:ex. i Kalmar 10. Styrm. o. be-fälh. i Adolf Bratt & Co. i Gbg 10-18, chef f. rederiavd. 19-35. Egna föret.: Rederi A-B Eva 20, Rederi A-B Alicia 29, Rederi- & Skeppsmäkl :firma Harry Bratt 35, Harry Bratt A-B 39, Eda Glasbruk 42, Fastigh. A-B Harry Bratt 43, verkst. dir. o. styr :ordf. i dessa föret. Venezuelas konsul i Gbg 23, gen:konsul 40-46, chargé d’affaires 40-46. Tjf. peruansk gen-.konsul 23-26, genrkonsul 27-29, tjg. gen :konsul 29-40. Hob’bies: ridning, segling. BmmeryM, FSftjk, Gbgs landst:bef:-f ören. GM, GbgS’ lands t : ryttareför en. ftjik, Gbigs ilandst :förb. ungid :avd. för-tj:M.
translated: Bratt, Karl Harry Malcolm, Consul General, Gothenburg, b. 21/1/90 in Stockholm to Traffic Manager Hugo B. and Elvira Blomqvist. - Apprentice mate in Gothenburg in 1909, ship captain in Kalmar in 1910. Mate and commander at Adolf Bratt & Co. in Gothenburg from 1910-1918, head of shipping department in 1919-1935. Own companies: Shipping Company Eva in 1920, Shipping Company Alicia in 1929, Shipping and Shipbrokerage: Harry Bratt & Co. in 1935, Harry Bratt Ltd. in 1939, Eda Glassworks in 1942, Property Harry Bratt Ltd. in 1943, managing director and chairman of these companies. Venezuela's Consul in Gothenburg in 1923, Consul General from 1940-1946, Chargé d'Affaires from 1940-1946. Peruvian Consul General from 1923-1926, Consul General from 1927-1929, Acting Consul General from 1929-1940. Hobbies: horseback riding, sailing. Member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Agriculture, Forestry and Veterinary Medicine, Gothenburg's provincial councilors. Married with children.

memberOf.name: Royal Swedish Academy of Agriculture, Forestry and Veterinary Medicine
